snippet.title: Android Trojans downloaded by millions, still on Android Market
snippet.description: ...Symantec last week identified 13 new malicious applications on the Android Market, saying the combined download figuresreportedly up to 5 millionmake it "the highest distribution of any malware identified so far this year." The applications use Android.Counterclank, which Symantec says is "a bot-like threat that can receive commands to carry out certain actions, as well as steal in...

snippet.title: Pirated version of iWork '09 contains a nasty trojan
snippet.description: ..., you may end up infected with a trojan. Security firm Intego identified the trojan in question late yesterday. Dubbed OSX.Trojan.iServices.A, the trojan is hidden as an extra packageiWorkServices.pkgin... to install the software, the trojan installs as a startup item in /System/Library/StartupItems/iWorkS...

snippet.title: Crackdown on Zeus Trojan crime ring in progress, 60 charged
snippet.description: ...Law enforcement agencies say that over 60 people have been charged with trying to siphon millions of dollars out of banks by using the Zeus Trojan program. snippet.title: Viruses, Trojans, and worms, oh my: The basics on malware
snippet.description: ...Some say we're living in a "post-PC" world, but malware on PCs is still a major problem for home computer users and businesses.The examples are everywhere: In November, we reported that malware was used to steal information about one of Japan's newest rockets and upload it to computers controlled by hackers. Critical systems at two US power plants were recently found infected...

snippet.title: "Penguin Panic" trojan targets Windows iPhone users
snippet.description: ...iPhone-toting Windows users should keep an eye out for a trojan targeting their somewhat specific... file called Penguin.Panic.zip. When opened, the Troj/Agent-HNY trojan is released and will wreak havoc on Windows systems. The trojan was brought to light by security firm Sophos yesterday, although...
